divs: Sighting DetailsWas traveling back from Anderson, heading West on S.R. 26 when I noticed an unusual orange ball of light about 60 degrees above horizion in the western sky, slighty north of 26. It started out soft and fuzzy, got bright and then popped out completely. Then it popped back in brightly for a second or two and then disappeared for good. It never moved from the same spot. There were no clouds in the sky, the sky was clear and the temp was approx 60 degrees with a slight breeze.
Summary: Orange ball of light blinks in and out.
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Wayne
There were no other sightings in Fort Wayne on or around July 4th 2009
